article.title: Notification obligation regarding rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing

content.description: The controller shall communicate any rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing carried out in accordance with Article 16, Article 17(1) and Article 18.

conditions.condition: This communication is required unless it proves impossible or involves disproportionate effort.

rights.right: The controller shall inform the data subject about those recipients if the data subject requests it.
